## FilepickerBuilderOptions.filesystem property

FileSystem adapter for file operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filesystem: FileSystemAdapter;
```

## Remarks

Required for reading directory contents and file metadata. For Node.js, use `platform.filesystem` from `createNodePlatform()`<!-- -->.
